categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Admiral Jaeffis was an officer in the Imperial Navy and the commander in charge of defending the Corellian shipyards from New Republic attack following the Battle of Endor. When Admiral Roek was recalled along with his task force to reinforce the system's defenses, it was presumed by New Republic-affiliated agent Dirk Harkness that Jaeffis would end up reporting to Roek.
